io.discloader.discloader.entity.channels

Class GuildChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.discloader.discloader.entity.channels.Channel
      • io.discloader.discloader.entity.channels.GuildChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IChannel, IGuildChannel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TextChannel, VoiceChannel

    public class GuildChannel
extends Channel
implements IGuildChannel
    Represents any channel in a guild
    Author:
    Perry Berman

    • Field Detail

      • guild

        public final Guild guild
        The Guild the channel belongs to.
        This property must be null if the Channel.type of the channel is "dm", or "groupDM".
        Since:
        0.0.1

      • isPrivate

        public boolean isPrivate()
        Description copied from interface: IChannel
        Whether or not the channel is a dm channel. Is always true if type is "groupDM" or "dm"
        Specified by:
        isPrivate in interface IChannel
        Overrides:
        isPrivate in class Channel
        Returns:

        Description copied from interface: IGuildChannel

        Specified by:

        Specified by:
        setPermissions in interface IGuildChannel
